column5: Jewel on the Comal River! This 2 bedroom/2 bath has 1 King, 1 Queen and 1 sleeper and sleeps 6 guests. It is a corner sitting unit nearest the elevators for easy access to & from your vacation's activities! It comes equipped with all the makings of a great vacation.
column8: Jewel on the Comal River! Walking Distance to Schlitterbahn and Downtown! - Inverness 213
